name: Steam Shutdown
tagline: A simple and lightweight program that will shutdown your PC after Steam has finished all of its downloads
body:
# Steam-Shutdown
A simple and lightweight program that will shutdown your PC after Steam has finished all of its downloads

# How to use
Enter your interval or mode (shutdown, reboot, sleep, hibernate or custom), and the program will do the rest.

# Contributors
[benjibobs](https://github.com/benjibobs)

[Casper BL](https://github.com/Ezzpify)

[/u/NoRoom4Smarts](https://www.reddit.com/user/NoRoom4Smarts) - Icon creator
